about.title: About me
about.introduction: Hey there, I'm Lukas! Write some information about yourself that is IT related. Why are you passionate about coding? What is your source of inspiration for improving your programming skills?
about.locationDescription: Where are you based? Would you be open to working remotely or potentially relocating?
about.openmindedDescription: Show that you are open-minded. Are you enthusiastic about learning new technologies and continually improving your skills?
about.problemsolvingDescription: A brief description of your problem-solving approach. Do you learn from each challenge as you search for the most efficient or elegant solution? You can include some keywords like: analytical thinking, creativity, persistence and collaboration.

skills.pdescription: A short introduction of your skills. Highlight your experience of using different front-end technologies and emphasise your openness to learning and adapting to new technologies. Show how important it is for you to keep up with the rapid changes in web development.
skills.contactMe: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.
skills.specialInterest: I have a special interest in learning

projects.explore: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

01.name: Join
01.longDescription: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

02.name: El Pollo Locco
02.longDescription: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.

03.name: DA Bubble
03.longDescription: This App is a Slack Clone App. It revolutionizes team communication and collaboration with its intuitive interface, real-time messaging, and robust channel organization.

references.heading: What my colleagues say about me

testimonials.text: Our project benefited enormously from Lukas efficient way of working.
testimonials.author: T.Schulz - Frontend Developer

testimonials.text: Lukas has proven to be a reliable group partner. His technical skills and proactive approach were crucial to the success of our project.
testimonials.author: H.Janisch - Team Partner

testimonials.text: I had the good fortune of working with Simon in a group project at the Developer Akademie that involved a lot of effort. He always stayed calm, cool, and focused, and made sure our team was set up for success. He's super knowledgeable, easy to work with, and I'd happily work with him again given the chance.
testimonials.author: A. Fischer - Team Partner

contact.title: Contact me
contact.heading: Let's work together
contact.description:
Encourage people to contact you and describe what role you are interested in.
Show that you will add value to their projects through your work.

form.nameError: Oops! it seems your name is missing

form.messageError: What do you need to develop?
form.privacyPolicyAgree: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
